articles.title: Britain to pilot using smaller doses of monkeypox vaccine - Global Times
articles.description: Britain is following the US and Europe in making the most of limited supply of the monkeypox vaccine by administering smaller doses of the shot, health officials said on Monday.
articles.content: Britain is following the US and Europe in making the most of limited supply of the monkeypox vaccine by administering smaller doses of the shot, health officials said on Monday.Three National Health … [+1687 chars]

articles.title: Euro zone slide towards recession pins euro to 20-year low - Reuters
articles.description: Contraction in the euro zone economy for a second straight month pinned the single currency to a 20-year low against the dollar on Tuesday, with surging gas prices adding to misery dragging Europe towards recession.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 23 (Reuters) - Contraction in the euro zone economy for a second straight month pinned the single currency to a 20-year low against the dollar on Tuesday, with surging gas prices adding t… [+4459 chars]

articles.title: ASX sinks to two-week low, Wall Street and European markets fall on recession signals - ABC News
articles.description: Australian shares fall on growing fears that central bank efforts to tame rising consumer prices with inflation-busting interest-rate hikes will weaken the global economy and lead to a recession.

articles.title: New water map of Mars will prove invaluable for future exploration - European Space Agency
articles.description: A new map of Mars is changing the way we think about the planet’s watery past, and showing where we should land in the future.
